title: A Golden Age
author: Tahmima Anam
description: Set in the backdrop of Bangladesh's war for independence, A Golden Age is a poignant tale of a mother's struggle and sacrifice for her children amidst the chaos of war.

title: The Good Muslim
author: Tahmima Anam
description: The Good Muslim is a powerful exploration of faith, family, and the challenges of modernity in Bangladesh. It follows the lives of two siblings as they navigate through the aftermath of war and political turmoil.

title: River of Smoke
author: Amitav Ghosh
description: Though not entirely set in Bangladesh, River of Smoke delves into the history of the opium trade, which significantly impacted Bangladesh's economy during the British colonial period. It's a rich narrative that intertwines multiple characters and their destinies.

title: The Hungry Tide
author: Amitav Ghosh
description: Set in the Sundarbans, The Hungry Tide is a mesmerizing tale of love, adventure, and the clash between humans and nature. Ghosh's vivid prose brings the beauty and danger of this unique landscape to life.
